website_summaries.verdict: Four-color starter kit with 85 pieces includes quality manicure tools, lamp, and more. Long-lasting color.
pros: 21-day wear with proper application and nail care
48 watt LED lamp has 3 timer settings
Manicure tools are superior to those in competitor starter kits
cons: Starter colors are a bit too bold or dark for those with more neutral or toned-town taste

customer_reviews.title: Beauty is in the product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product I will recommend this to a lot of people I don't know how long it's going to last this is my first time trying it. But I'm sure it will last long.... it's gel polish. I got many compliments...
customer_reviews.author: Eb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this starter kit. It comes with everything you need! I did need a couple coats of the color to make it look good and not streaky but once i did that they came out great! I can’t comment on longevity because i just did them but i would recommend this if someone is looking into buying a kit.
customer_reviews.author: Treising1

customer_reviews.title: Don’t depend on the gel colors provided- otherwise the rest is great
customer_reviews.text: I want to be clear- the main reason I’m giving this a 3 is because the polish COLORS that came wit this set are crap. They bubble and peel. The base and topper are great, and I’ve not had any issues when I use OTHER brands of nail polish. Even when I mix hydrocol with my regular polishes to create gel, it comes out perfectly. The problem is with their gel colors. The rest of the items included are great, and useful and make this set worth it overall. Just don’t depend on their colors.
customer_reviews.author: L.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Best nail kit on the market and a reasonable price and great quality. It was easy to do my own nails. During Covid-19 nail salons were shut down so I learned how to do my own nails and save money! Just buy tips for gel nails and extra colors. 3 coats of color. I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Kelletr

customer_reviews.title: Polish is Chunky
customer_reviews.text: Nail polish was very thick and chunky. Set for 90 seconds but it didn't cure. Kit is nice; but polish is disappoining. On an odd note; all the boxes of polish were open too. Bottles didn't appear to be opened but I thought that was odd and thought maybe it had been opened since the polish was so thick and chunky.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick McClure

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: This brand is the best if you want to start using gel. Is the best. Totally worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Great colors but it doesn't last they peel off next day
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 buy this gel kit instead of others!
customer_reviews.text: I was super skeptical about buying any of these gel kits. I did my research, and found this one to be the best rated one. I finally purchased it and it was just as described! I love it so much. Definitely recommend. It leaves results like if you did them at the salon.
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Great for starters who want to do their own nails
customer_reviews.author: Emma Frey

customer_reviews.title: This product hurts
customer_reviews.text: This product is nicely packaged and the nail polish colors are beautiful. My biggest complaint is the base coat and top coat both feel like your nails are on fire when you stick them under the uv light!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: This product stopped working within 2 weeks of getting it! I only used it once! I’m not very satisfied at all.
customer_reviews.author: Marianna Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Salon quality
customer_reviews.text: Extremely satisfied with this purchase! I will never step foot in a salon again 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: I'm never goin to a nail salon again
customer_reviews.text: I get to do my nails for $40 that's a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Jessa Carl

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this kit a part from the good reviews. I am so glad I went ahead and bought it. I treated myself to a in-home mani and my nails came out looking glamorous and very professional looking. I am buying a few of these to give out to family members.
customer_reviews.author: M.P. 🐈

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually leave reviews, however this product is great. I just got it and used it, so I can't say how long the polish will last. However I always used regular polish and with my work my nails would be peeled off by the end of the day. I've never used gel before or even gone to a salon but it had all the tools needed and pretty colors. Didn't take too long to cure and my nails feel very solid. The light is nice quality and definitely cures each layer in 30 seconds but I ran it in again to be safe cause this is my first time using it and wanted to be sure
customer_reviews.author: Shaina

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure what to expect with this product but it works great! The instructions were clear and easy to follow and the kit came with everything needed to complete a manicure at home. This is the 4th day of my nails being done using the kit and they are still shiny without ANY chipping!
customer_reviews.author: amy dodd

customer_reviews.title: Polish doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I loved the lamp and all the nail prep items. However, the polish peels off every time within 2 days. I used other brands, and the polish last 1-2 weeks. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

product_meta.title: AZUREBEAUTY Gel Nail Polish Starter Kit with 48W UV/LED Light Nail Lamp(3 Timer Setting), 4 Elegant Color Nail Gel, Base Top Coat(12ml)+Manicure Tools Essentials Nail Art Designs
feature_bullets: ❤A WONDERFUL STARTER KIT: 85 pcs in one kit, a complete nail art starter kit，no need to go to nail salon.
❤48W LED NAIL LAMP: This lamp can perfectly cure all kinds of UV/LED based gel products, with cord and 3 time setting, presenting you an efficient/safe/convenient home manicure machine.
❤NAIL ART FUN: You can DIY popular nail art styles with this nail starter kit, make fun easier.
❤SOAK OFF UV/LED GEL: Big capacity(12ml),with a proper application, 21 Days+ wearing is attainable.
❤CUSTOMER SERVICE: Any problem, contact the seller directly, we offer replace or resend service.
